definition: examination of the evidence of the opposing party in a court of law
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: Other circumstances in which the experts' conclusion cannot be as the evidence upon the cross-examination.
sentences.chinese: 经过质证认定不能作为证据使用的其他情形。

sentences.english: Strengthening the function of court trial requires more of Cross - examination and Attestation.
sentences.chinese: 强化庭审功能必然也对质证和认证提出了新的要求。

sentences.english: The grade-b qualification certificate to engage in the consulting of capital expenditure issued by the construction committee of shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 山东省建设委员会颁发的工程造价咨询乙级资质证书。

sentences.english: The second part is its characteristics and effects of the cross-examination.
sentences.chinese: 论文第二部分是“质证的性质及其效力”。

sentences.english: Commensurate with the quality of inspection certificate grading operations.
sentences.chinese: 与资质证书等级相适应的勘察业务。

sentences.english: The evidence shall be exhibited in court, and be cross-examined by the parties concerned.
sentences.chinese: 证据应当在法庭上出示，由当事人质证。

sentences.english: Article 45 The evidence shall be presented during the hearings and may be examined by the parties.
sentences.chinese: 第45条证据应当在开庭时出示，当事人可以质证。

sentences.english: Article 47 Evidences shall be presented at court and be cross-examined by the parties concerned.
sentences.chinese: 第四十七条证据应当在法庭上出示，由当事人质证。

sentences.english: The expertise report should be cross-examined by both parties and advice should be given.
sentences.chinese: 鉴定意见书应当经双方当事人质证，发表意见。

sentences.english: The copy of the sheet above and certificate are given to regional manager.
sentences.chinese: 上述申请表格与资质证书复印件交四春公司区域经理。

sentences.english: It is concluded that the Abnormal Savda is the main syndrome of depression in the traditional Uighur Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 由此得出，异常黑胆质证是抑郁症的维医主要证型。

sentences.english: During this trial, there are many doubtable pieces of evidence which must be re-verified.
sentences.chinese: 这次审判中，有许多证据有质证，需要重新核实。

sentences.english: Prethrombosis state is more obvious in Abnormal Savda syndrome than that of non Abnormal Savda syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 复杂性疾病异常黑胆质证患者血栓前状态改变明显。

sentences.english: The evidence shall be displayed and cross-examined by the litigants at the court.
sentences.chinese: 证据应当在法庭上出示，并由当事人互相质证。

sentences.english: The parties concerned may request for cross-examining the evidences collected by the arbitration panel on its own initiative.
sentences.chinese: 当事人可以对仲裁庭自行收集的证据提出质证意见。

definition: probative value/strength of evidence in legal proof/relevance
to protest against a verdict/to lodge an appeal
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
to retract testimony/to withdraw a confession
